channel.title: Rune Online
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=4][url=http://runeonline.ucoz.com/index/game/0-6]Webclient[/url] [url=http://runeonline.ucoz.com/forum]Forum[/url] [URL=http://http://runeonline.no-ip.org/rodb/hiscores.php]Hiscores[/URL][/SIZE]
Features
All skills trainable with loads of content Competitive online hiscores Moderate XP rates, not too fast or too slow Random events with good rewards Holiday events for discontinued items All players treated equally Lots of quest remakes with useful rewards Tons of monsters all around the world Every part of the world reachable with useful content No overpowered items No super staff with godlike abilities - everyone is the same Daily updates based on player feedback Full clipping, safespots galore! Different emotes for different attack styles Accidentally get 2 defence? Reset it!
Skill guides [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sj7VBFG.png[/img]
Quests [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wpCHBFX.png[/img]
Agility [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uJ7duMu.png[/img]
Superheat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p2NsHrt.png[/img]
Enchanting [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z55MuAc.png[/img]
Tele grab [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Sz8JtAF.png[/img]
Entangle [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/srCvM5C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9Z8mIhR.png[/img]
Crafting [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z7loVmx.png[/img]
Smelting [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bSjXYjH.png[/img]
Farming [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8xlb369.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ld488ow.png[/img]
[I]And much, much more...[/I]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Rune Online
